Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the cost. takes good pictures in good light conditions and in bad lighting as indoors even Nikon L120 does not give you good results that are way pricy. could be thinner but I like AA battery cameras as You are not limited to manufacturer ones that may be the known issue as seen in reviews.So, very good camera for the price to have with you in pocket, as the best camera is the one you have when you need it :)I really like the picture quality as I expected worth.

ProductInfo.Name: Kodak easyshare c1530 14 Megapixel Digital Camera w/ 3x Optical Zoom and 3 LCD White New/Sealed @WHOLESALEOUTLETLLC
